testimonials.text: You made it so simple. My new site is so much faster and easier to work with than my old site. I just choose the page, make the change and click save.

Rajesh can be one of the most brilliant developers and works very hard to make sure he delivers the projects. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
